content: Works great
I've had it about a week and I've been happy
Works good
Wont connect to cams, not my first rodeo with cams or apps

Device started out operating great . Had a quick installation along with a successful configuration of profile, video recording etc. I've had my smart camera set up correctly for 24 hours and within that time I've had to troubleshoot why my camera at random becomes disconnected somehow and states my device is offline.. I ran system test and it says all is running great and internet is working fine.. but after all checking out.. still remains offline?? Save your $ don't buy this
Always a clear viewing and accurate
Changing from vertical to horizontal always resets the cam to go to the beginning of the date. Plugged in, I get constant alarms that battery is low. No batteries in.
I LOVE THIS DEVICE, BECAUSE ITS EASY TO MONITOR YOUR RESIDENCE WITHOUT BEING THERE. JUST PULL UP THE APP AND MAKE A COUPLE TAPS AND YOU'RE THERE
Great camera and great app #1 in my book
Work better than I hoped. Just a little sensitive at night. Alot of bugs and spiders set off my motion detector. But does it's job thanks vivitar.
Your awesome to be able to help not so computer savvy perple.
The app is probably a good app but my low rating is because the cameras are junk. They always have network errors and trying to figure out how to use the scenerios is way too complicated.
Perfect for my needs I travel Alot n have a dog so it allows me to check in on him with live video... And talk to him love this thing

These are not great cameras at all they only support 2.4 ghz WiFi who has that. The WiFi from Xfinity is 5ghz it doesn't work with these and then it says you can't return them to the store you have to call customer service

Just downloaded app. After choosing "register" the app tells me it "has unexpectedly exited multiple times" & is full on cache, even though I've never used it . I even tried to delete the cache it did have and it didn't help. Can I register elsewhere or is it as it seems, this app no longer works?
This has to be the best security camera for $40
Don't buy the wired cameras that don't do very well .

Love it!!!!

This app sucks!! After we installed the doorbell, it worked an entirety of 2 mins....it went offline and hasn't worked since. We even bought one of those mesh internet extenders to make sure the signal was reaching.....nothing!!!! Don't waist your money or time. So disappointing.
Makes the sound not right when paired with my bluetooth speaker

TERRIBLE SYSTEM!!! Whats the point of recording if you cant export the data?!?! Pathetic! Its MY camera, my data, NOT YOURS!!! So why cant I do what I want with it??? How do I know Vivitar employees arent watching my feed?? And Im convinced "location" services not working for EVERYONE is NOT an accident!! Spent $200 on 5 cameras without doing HW which is not like me, but I saw Vivitar and assumed good things!! I believe I will be returning my cameras! Why keep something that isnt what I want??
We love this camera it's great the quality is pretty good I would recommend this to everyone
The best

Good camera it don't rotate that could be better but two way sound works better than others I've bought!
It's great, vivitar should make a wall control panel too just in case the phone poops out or something else that can happen.
Nice and easy to navigate. Great product.

My timestamps do not match the playback time ribbon. It's an hour and a few minutes off. No way to export my video, why not? I need certain times scoped. Cannot do this currently. I needed 14:48 - 16:08. Cannot extract to my phone. I realize this is not Lorex, but still. Finish your product, as it is not great to go live with yet.

Bought this about a year ago. Easy to set up. Love that it sends a picture to my phone when it detects movement or any loud noise . Makes me feel good that I can be 100 miles away and check in on my cam any time I want. If I do have an intruder, I can call the police and have that person arrested. I will have pictures and a video of the intruder for the police, district attorney and the judge. A camera doesn't lie.
Great app
Love it work very good
I've bought n bought security cameras but Vivutar you really out did your self.

SD card , no control or way to read or format card. WiFi range is not good as it doesn't even work on part of my driveway.

DO NOT SUBSCRIBE TO PAID SERVICES. The software used is garbage. It's a shame that you guys put more effort into designing a better app and allowing more access to camera capabilities. Why can't I access the camera with ip address or force camera to connect to my own server.
Good device app could be better

Audio needs to be encoded in a different codec. As of now, audio comes through as mono and uses the same audio profile as a phone call. Upgrade to stereo and change file format/codec processing to match, Please!!!
Timeout trouble

I would appreciate an update for Daylight Savings Time in the U.S. my time stamps are off by an hour, and the location service is horrid at best. Definitely need the developers to get to work and fix some of these major issues. I think with a fair amount of updates to the app, that the vivitar brand could do very well. Will give 5 stars if the updates I've asked for are implemented. Having an integrated share feature would be nice as well.

Works great. My first experience with Smart Security, but it's a blessing to have acquired this, truly makes my day much more manageable and I can sleep just a little bit better at night...and u can't put a price on that.
Works great!
I was really impressed with quality of the nighttime and audio with the price with this

Works great and cheaper price than the other camera systems I have seen.

For the price point, it was difficult to set up but once I called a techie buddy of mine, it was very simple, and works in tandem with the whole home. I feel my family it's safer because of this. Thank you vivatar.
Cool
Love how it automatically records if it captures motion. Also how you can adjust the sensitivity meter.
Excellent

Ok quality. Just not sure why it only monitors at night and takes stills and records only at night. I've reset it and still can get it to record during the day. There is no schedule so that's not the reason.
i love this product i can listen to everything and talk to my family
Awesome

This is by far the worst ... app i have ever used I bought a couple cameras and was going to set them up but thought I should see if it worked before installed it and wouldn't you know the app is trash i spent an hour just trying to get to the home screen but every time I opened it, the app crashed and said to clear cache and retry but every time I did I got the same screen over and over DO NOT SPEND MONEY FOR THESE DEVICES
Does not save flip for camera or hd settings within camera app after you close it. Also time is off in real time by an hour on time stamp. Fix now

I like it

Absolute GARBAGE!!!! The vivitar branded device is not available on the list of devices for setup. Time vampire. The qr scanner does not work. Absolutely irritated at the waste of money and time. I will never, ever buy vivitar again. How the mighty have fallen. And no desktop app? Geez, talk about terrible misses.

The app kept putting my phone on vibrate randomly so I would miss alarms and calls and it would turn itself on without my permission and when it was off randomly I would see that it was clicking as if it was taking small clips so I would have to turn the camera to an object. I uninstalled it and my phone volume went back to normal when I did have it it had ok camera quality without a sims card u couldn't use the play back option it wasn't worth keeping simply for it randomly changing my phone
Not working correctly. Times are set to go off at 9pm. And yet they don't go off at times until after 10pm or set to go on at 1pm and don't come on until 3pm.
Slow but does have amazing image
Have not had app long time Set the time and date right with my time zones been 2 weeks

I would give this 5 stars but my security camera started screwing up. The first day I had the camera, I could adjust it up, down, and side to side, but now it will not let me adjust it up and down . I do believe it's a malfunction with the camera itself and not the app but I'm unsure how to fix it.

After using your camera less than 60 days, I had nothing but problems with this product: 1. The camera won't stay online half the time. 2. This camera is slow 🐌 unresponsive even after the software update. Right now my camera is offline, wile everything else that use WiFi works just fine. Your help concerning this matter would be greatly appreciated. Due to the poor 😞 performance of this product, the best I can do is one 🌟. Please contact me and explain.
Says it records in color but it definitely doesn't. Only in black and white. Bummer. Paid $40 for false advertising.
I like it, but their is a delay when I walk by it I can be in the house before it takes the picture so I will not show up on the picture,is there anyway I can make it more sensitive
Wont download
Very good product
The motion detector does not go off quick enough, hitching it to a computer is beyond my skills, I'm looking at ditching your product.
I bought two Vivitar cameras and they use different apps. I bought them at the same store and didn't notice they were slightly different models.

The old app was a lot better for playback. The camera only records a few seconds of video to the SD card instead of recording the whole time there is motion (or extra). You can't view most of the videos on playback because you have to find it on a timeline and it usually errors out without playing the video. The message screen shows a snapshot of what was recorded, but when you click to view the video, it goes to live feed. Wish I could connect the newer camera to the old app that worked better
I have yet to figure out how save recordings.. i have cameras set up. 1 of these and Yi home. By far yi home is easier to use. This one will not read or operate properly with an s.d. card.

freaking sucks can't do anything with it goes off all the time if i turn a light on in another room it goes off if its sunny and sunlight comes in it goes off if the tv flickers two rooms away it goes off tried to adjust the sensitivity don't think that does anything it just a button the developers put on there to make us think we had some control over it got so tired of hearing it ding all the time i turned it off kind of defeats the purpose of having the damm thing what a waste dont buy!!!!
Its slow need it to be real tims action
Love it but need a lil bit of work but still love it

I use this app in conjunction with Vivitar light switches. Setup and linking with the switches is fairly straight forward and easy with a good 2.4 WI-FI signal. Linking to Alexa is easy. Last update still has not addressed location services not functioning which is frustrating. Overall the switches and Alexa capabilities make this a great value. Just fix the location bug!!
This app is horrible worked fine for 4 days now camera doesn't stay connected very unreliable
I like it all. Easy to operate, user friendly, and affordable.
Doorbell is offline and will not work. It never had the doorbell chime settings in the app. Had it less than 60 days. Would not ever purchase this brand again.
Don't get it i got hacked they dont mess with u for months but they try ur accounts and everthing !!!

Pictures are extremely clear and the alert system is very responsive. However, if the internet connection fails or the power goes out, a complete reset seems necessary, which can take several hours and may not work😰
The view is very good and also distance could be a little sharper other than that i love it . I would recomend to a friend
Love this

The camera is great for the price its as good as my high dollar cameras. However, the app is lousy its functionality is very limited. The time stamp is an hour off and I can't figure out how to change it to the correct time. If they would update this app this could become a 5 star review instead of a two. The Camera are great. Operational, very clear picture, great night vision. The cameras get 5 star. The app gets 1 star. Its is minimally functional. Very hard to navigate. My biggest issue... I have multiple cameras, including outdoor and indoor. With the app, you are only allowed to view one at a time. If sakar would like to be considered for any real home security and monitoring, they seriously need to upgrade the software so someone can view multiple (as many as needed) camerafeeds atonce

I dont know if the app is buggy or something with my internet but its not just doing this on my device. I was cool once it finally connected now a new issue.

Product good. Secure? That is questionable. The device lights up red when someone is viewing the room from their phone app. My kids see the red light during the night, I'm not viewing them, so who is? No one else in my family has access to view the camera.
Works wonders but it needs a better widget that actually works and maybe a proximity sensor to turn on your divices when you get close to your house or room I hope you update this app soon

Great video camaras and app, the only downside I had encountered and prevents me to give it a 5 star rating is that when trying to do the two way talking the app kicks you out and you have to go back and enter. Other than that works great love it!

Limited space so here goes So The night vision is not useful unless you have a light source, The motion censor only snaps a quick blip of the object why not have it be a 10 second duration or 30 but 2 seconds and then nothing else after it is disappointing. A simple hook up and day time is clear but you basically have to jump to the screen to record manually to obtain anything useful. Easy updates I guess it is what it is. The app also has useless features and cluttered with many categories.
Love being able to control my kids tv, when they won't turn it off. Our little safety policy for bedtime.

Very surprised by this little camera. Been wanting a security for the house. Took a chance on this inexpensive security camera. Bought 1 & figured if it wasn't good I could use it to watch my ducks! LOL But was so impressed with clarity & motion detection. Even at night you can see a face perfectly clear. I went back to the store & bought 2 more. Hope they last awhile, but it's been fun to watch & talk to my dog when I'm out! & love the alarm/buzzer on the newer ones to scare away someone!
Love it, can watch while I'm not home. Well worth the $$.

I wish could give this whole website 0 stars. They have outdoor material where they dont even warrant outdoor faults. I called customer support, Buddy was outside when he answered. I said " hey i purchased a device from you that is an outside security camera." He said " we dont sell security cameras." I said "well i bought 1 a week ago and i have a reciept." He then just asked me for my item # and flat out told me that my warranty wasnt covered. All i can say this is doodoo

The location function does not work in this Vivitar app! Location is needed for sunrise and sunset automations. I wasted almost 2 weeks communicating with developer with no success. I also installed on second phone and tried second login ID with no success. If you want an app that works, try the Feit Electric app instead. It is also based on the Sakar platform, so it connects to both Feit and Vivitar smart devices. And the location function works in the Feit app!

Bought a smart plug. Instructions were easy. Checked that wifi was working and 2.4. Found the device, said it was registering it, then timed out over and over again. Followed steps to the letter. Never connected. Thanks for wasting time I'll never get back.

Garbage, not like the other vivitar app at all. I have 2 separate apps for 3 cameras. I hate this one. It doesn't allow the same features. It sucks!! Also looks nothing like the fake screenshots!!

I'd rate with no stars if possible. I've purchased the cloud service twice now and it records nothing and no one replies to my messages asking why I'm paying for a service I'm not being provided with! Not very happy to say the least. Fortunately the service was inexpensive but it's still my money being wasted

Pictures are crystal clear, even the night vision. Set up was easy. It stores pictures to your phone. Videos show up if there is a card in the camera. Alerts your phone when movements are detected. The cord could be longer. ( 10 foot would be great ) The camera only swivels up or down. I wish it would move right to left too. Other than that, great camera for a great price. With the APP you can add and control SMART devices too. I have not done that but the option is there. 2 way intercom too
Would not link up

Bought a smart plug for my mom to use with Google home and her tablet. She doesn't have a smart phone... the app is not configured to work with tablets and won't let me register or sign in... please fix. This would be very handy for my elderly mom.
Softwear dose not turn on your screen in alert mode. Speaker behind camera sounds cheese. Was going to buy one more but change my mind. But camera sends out a good picture.

Way too difficult to set up .read the directions 100 times. I cannot get passed step 9 of the manual no matter how many times I reset the device . Camera won't scan the QR and even when it does scan it and emits a sound (rarely) it times out while trying to connect.

I cannot erase old pictures/shots taken by the cameras. I erase them, then they don't stay 'erased'; the pictures are returned to my system file. I keep trying to erase the pictures and they won't erase. I want to return both of the cameras I purchased, but I can't erase the private pictures (i.e., me walking by camera in my underwear for example). Watch out folks!
